reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must ladies!
reviews.reviewText: Are you constantly digging for the mirror in your purse to put on your lipgloss or check your hair quickly? This blingy mirror fits perfectly on the back of your phone. Excellent buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No comment. Product is what I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Couldn’t find this product forever because I originally purchased it either through another online store or at one of those booths at the mall.Hasn’t come off once, not even budging. So if you don’t put it on aligned well, good luck getting it off. I adore it. Cleans very well (don’t have to clean it often). My favourite part of my phone.
